page.title: 04A DAY'S NEWS, COVE.
page.content: Proposals to open up a new motorway junction in Cove will affect local schools. Meetings are being held to object to the access as it passes near {Guillimont Junior School}and would increase the volume of traffic in the whole area. *************** {Education}is in the news in many ways in this area.Local councillors have objected to the way{school governors} are appointed.Pupil/teacher ratio is the worst in the country 19.6.As {teachers pay}dispute continues there is concern over childrens education. ************ Youth club in St. Johns Road had to close when heavy summer rain poured in to the building.Â£10000 expected to be spent on a new roof. ************
